nodes.bodyText:
We could probably get rid of this initialPoint variable and just put it straight in the Viewpoint constructor.
Either way, we could definitely get rid of the comment at the back of the line creating the Viewpoint which describes the input parameters.

  
    
  
    

  
  This file contains bidirectional Unicode text that may be interpreted or compiled differently than what appears below. To review, open the file in an editor that reveals hidden Unicode characters. Learn more about bidirectional Unicode characters


  


    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                  Point initialPoint = new Point(-12000000, 5400000, SpatialReferences.getWebMercator());
          
          
            
                  Viewpoint viewpoint = new Viewpoint(initialPoint, 10000000); // point, scale
          
          
            
                  Viewpoint viewpoint = new Viewpoint(new Point(-12000000, 5400000, SpatialReferences.getWebMercator()), 10000000);
Have removed the Point and just set the Viewpoint.
Same suggestion as above, at the very least let's ditch the comment.
Removed Point and just set Viewpoint
If you're feeling up for it, you could clean up lines 62-67 as well to match the previous samples in this review?
Made a few changes to this one on the Viewpoint side of things too
